long_description: The sleek Mammut Neon Element 22 Pack is a versatile gear hauler for climbing or everyday use. It looks and feels great thanks to robust outer material and deliberately simple features. Comfortable to wear with its anatomically shaped, soft padded shoulder straps. Zip pocket with key holder. Large vertical front zip pocket for maps or climbing guides. The Mammut Neon Element 22 Pack features a padded, integrated laptop pocket.
short_description: The sleek Mammut Neon Element 22 Pack is a versatile gear hauler for climbing or everyday use. It looks and feels great thanks to robust outer material and deliberately simple features.
